TopicTitle: Heat shield shroud disappears after reload

Articles.Content:
Not sure if the bug exists in stock, but i've recognized it several times with stock parts also.

The shroud between heatshield and e.g. a decoupler disappears after reload, scene switch etc.

![LqEpjav.png](http://i.imgur.com/LqEpjav.png)
yep, exists in stock, noticed this when i attached a docking port to a heatshield. looks odd.
